channel.title: [Dementhium 639] Errors trying to use JackPot class

item.title: [Dementhium 639] Errors trying to use JackPot class
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I have this in my JackPot.java class

public void guessMessage() { player.sendMessage("Type ::guess to start."); }

I am trying to add this into my commands.java

if (command[0].equals("jackpot")) { JackPot JackPotObject = new JackPot(); JackPotObject.guessMessage(); }

It gives me this error

Compiling RS2Server... src\org\dementhium\content\Commands.java:112: error: cannot find symbol JackPotObject.guessMessage(); ^ symbol: method guessMessage() location: variable JackPotObject of type JackPot 1 error Complete Press any key to continue . . .

How can it not find the symbol?
I have it right

Read full topic
item.source: [Dementhium 639] Errors trying to use JackPot class
